payload.title: Implement RecordStore<T> with dependency injection and comprehensive tests
payload.description: Implement record_store.ts with generic RecordStore<T> class, solve Jest ESM mocking issues using dependency injection pattern, create comprehensive tests with EARS references, and update store_module.md blueprint.
payload.notes: Major breakthrough in solving Jest mocking issues. The dependency injection pattern proved to be the most reliable solution for fs mocking in ESM environment.
